text: Mike Jones (born 1954) is the athletic director and men's basketball head coach for Mississippi College. The floor at A. E. Wood Coliseum is Mike Jones Court. He is a member of the school's athletics hall of fame and Mississippi's Sports hall of fame. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American men's basketball coaches Category:Mississippi College alumni Category:Mississippi College Choctaws athletic directors Category:Mississippi College Choctaws men's basketball coaches Category:Junior college men's basketball coaches in the United States Category:Southern Miss Golden Eagles basketball coaches
title: Mike Jones (athletic director)
